earlyWarningMinimumMemory.earlyWarningMinimumMemory:
You have allocated less memory( %d MB) than the recommended minimum for this pack: %d MB.
The suggested amount for your system is: %d mb.
 Click OK to visit a wiki with instructions on how to allocate more memory, or Cancel to ignore this warning.

warningTolerance.desc:: Set how many percent the memory is allowed to deviate from the recommended for the system before warning about it, default: 30, max 100

recommendedMemory.desc:: Set the recommended memory values based off system memory in MB. ["system memory:recommended"]
